param.name: @spacer
param.label: [GLOBAL OPTIONS]
param.description: Options for both the box and the multi-column

param.name: backgroundcolor
param.label: Default Background Color
param.description: This is the default background color of your boxes. Please read the color chart on the left - or specify a hex value. e.g: #FFFF00

param.name: bordercolor
param.label: Default Border Color
param.description: This is the default border color of your boxes. Please read the color chart on the left - or specify a hex value. e.g: #FFFF00

param.name: padding
param.label: Default Padding
param.description: This is the default padding. MS Internet Explorer requires this to be in pixel otherwise no rounded box due to Javascript error - but if you don't care you can specify in the following units: em, px, pt. e.g: 1.0em, 20px, and so on.

param.name: boxfloat
param.label: Default floating position
param.description: This is the default floating position if you don't specify it at the tag where the niftybox is displayed

param.name: boxclearspace
param.label: Clear the space around the box?
param.description: If set to yes, text will not be displayed aligned with the box

param.name: columncontainerwidth
param.label: Container Width
param.description: The container of the columns. For instance, if you have 3 columns, each single one of them will be contained in a div tag. This is the width of that div tag
